question: 技術
sourceMnemonic: You've seen <ja>技</ja> as a vocab word meaning "technique," and the kanji <ja>術</ja> means <kanji>technique</kanji>. So this means <vocabulary>technique</vocabulary>! Your technique is also your <vocabulary>craft</vocabulary>, and what’s needed for <vocabulary>technology</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
